Html:
Hi There,

 

I am looking to write an array to a sheet so that it goes along the columns inserting the values from the array, From A1 Right up to CC12 etc.

 

I can't seem to find an efficent way to do this without manually looking all the cells. 

 

Is there another way to do it?

 

Regards,

 

Gavin
Have you looked at the worksheet's fromArray() method?
